org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command.exception

Class KeypleCardCommandException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • org.eclipse.keyple.core.service.exception.KeypleException
            • org.eclipse.keyple.core.card.command.exception.KeypleCardCommandException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    KeypleCardCommandUnknownStatusException

    public abstract class KeypleCardCommandException
extends KeypleException
    This exception is the parent abstract class of all Keyple card APDU commands exceptions.
    Since:
    0.9
